  • java.lang.Object

      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonDetectCalibrationApp, DeformImageKeyPointsApp, DemonstrationInterpolateScaleApp, EquirectangularCylinderApp, EquirectangularPinholeApp, EquirectangularRotatingApp, FisheyePinholeApp, RemoveLensDistortionApp, RenderSyntheticCamerModelApp, ShapeFitContourApp, VideoTrackerObjectQuadApp, VisualizeHogDescriptorApp, VisualizeImageHogCellApp

    public abstract class DemonstrationBase<T extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageBase<T>>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Provides some common basic functionality for demonstrations

    • Constructor Detail

      • DemonstrationBase

        public DemonstrationBase(boolean allowWebcameras,
                         java.util.List<?> exampleInputs,
                         boofcv.struct.image.ImageType<T> defaultType)

      • DemonstrationBase

        public DemonstrationBase(java.util.List<?> exampleInputs,
                         boofcv.struct.image.ImageType<T> defaultType)
        Constructor that specifies examples and input image type
        Parameters:
        exampleInputs - List of paths to examples. Either a String file path or PathLabel.
        defaultType - Type of image it's processing

    • Method Detail

      • handleInputChange

        protected void handleInputChange(DemonstrationBase.InputMethod method,
                                 int width,
                                 int height)
        Override to be notified when the input has changed. This is also a good location to change the default max FPS for streaming data. It will be 0 for webcam and 30 FPS for videos
        Parameters:
        method - Type of input source
        width - Width of input image
        height - Height of input image

      • processImage

        public abstract void processImage(int sourceID,
                                  long frameID,
                                  java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffered,
                                  boofcv.struct.image.ImageBase input)
        Process the image. Will be called in its own thread, but doesn't need to be re-entrant. If image is null then reprocess the previous image.

      • processImageThread

        protected void processImageThread(int sourceID,
                                  long frameID,
                                  java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffered,
                                  boofcv.struct.image.ImageBase input)

      • openFile

        public void openFile(java.io.File file)
        Opens a file. First it will attempt to open it as an image. If that fails it will try opening it as a video. If all else fails tell the user it has failed. If a streaming source was running before it will be stopped.

      • waitUntilDoneProcessing

        public void waitUntilDoneProcessing()
        waits until the processing thread is done.

      • openWebcam

        public void openWebcam()

      • reprocessSingleImage

        public void reprocessSingleImage()
        If just a single image was processed it will process it again. If it's a stream there is no need to reprocess, the next image will be handled soon enough.

      • replayVideo

        public void replayVideo()
        If the current input source is a video it will reload it from the start
